definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)
teacher in charge of a class
director of the local committee of the Women's Federation

sentences.english: Mr Charles was elected (the) chairman of the municipal education committee.
sentences.chinese: 查爾斯當選爲先生市教育委員會主任委員。

sentences.english: The boss promoted him to the post of chief accountant.
sentences.chinese: 老闆提升他爲會計室主任。

sentences.english: Shanxi College graduate, deputy chief physician.
sentences.chinese: 山西中醫學院畢業，副主任醫師。

sentences.english: The new teacher really rates with the director of our department.
sentences.chinese: 這位新來的教師深受我係系主任的好評。

sentences.english: LiKangyong----Vice-archiater of Dermatology & Venereal disease Dept.
sentences.chinese: 皮膚性病科，副主任醫師。

sentences.english: At that time, most of the deans and teachers of the department are my teachers.
sentences.chinese: 那時系裏的主任和教師大半是我的老師。

sentences.english: I'am Chen Tianming , from Shanghai post and telecommuincate service development company, I'am direct of the company's overseas department.
sentences.chinese: 我是上海郵電服務發展公司還外部主任陳天明。

sentences.english: And before that, he was a Deputy WHCS.
sentences.chinese: 在那之前，他是白宮辦公廳副主任。

sentences.english: Aimin Tang is director of the China Scientific Development Research Center.
sentences.chinese: 唐愛民，中國科學發展研究中心主任。

sentences.english: Yoshio Aoki is a director of the Japan Space Elevator Association.
sentences.chinese: 青木芳雄是日本太空梯協會主任。

sentences.english: We make the retired official our head of the club.
sentences.chinese: 我們選退休的那位幹部來當俱樂部的主任。

sentences.english: Sam Sleiman is the Director of Capital Programs and Environmental Affairs for Massport.
sentences.chinese: 山姆史萊蒙，是麻州港務局的環境事理主任。

sentences.english: Our head teacher has shared the cake among all the students at the party.
sentences.chinese: 我們的班主任老師在晚會上把蛋糕分給每個學生。

sentences.english: Workshop director of high-strength comrades wholeheartedly welcome customers to negotiate business.
sentences.chinese: 車間主任高強同志竭誠歡迎廣大客戶前來洽談業務。

sentences.english: National Development and Reform Commission deputy director of the financial Lian Cao said.
sentences.chinese: 國家發展和改革委員會財政連曹副主任說。

sentences.english: In this speech, Dean Ching-yun Chuang promotes the importance of happiness.
sentences.chinese: 本講座我們邀請莊景雲主任來推廣快樂的重要性。

definition: the head of an institution whose name ends in 院[yuan4]/chair of a board/president of a university/department head/dean/premier of the Republic of China/CL:個|个[ge4]
deputy chair of board/vice-president (of a university etc)
